solution_line_template: Calculating the difference between the can lids Aaron has now and the amount that he had initially shows there were {total_lids_now} - {initial_lids} = <<{total_lids_now}-{initial_lids}={lids_from_boxes}>>{lids_from_boxes} can lids in the boxes of canned tomatoes.

As the boxes are the same size, splitting these can lids equally shows that there were {lids_from_boxes} / {num_boxes} = <<{lids_from_boxes}/{num_boxes}={lids_per_box}>>{lids_per_box} can lids in each box.
